last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 1
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ishqiya is a 2020 Pakistani television series premiered on ARY Digital on 3 February 2020. It is produced by Fahad Mustafa and Dr. Ali Kazmi under Big Bang Entertainment. It revolves around two sisters, Hamna and Roomi played by Ramsha Khan and Hania Amir respectively.
